0.text: Innate: Talon's abilities apply a stack of Wound to enemy  champions and large  monsters each time they are hit. Wound lasts for 6 seconds, refreshing with basic attacks and subsequent hits, and stacks up to 3 times.

1.text: Talon's next  basic attack against an enemy with 3 Wound stacks will consume them all to cause the target to bleed, dealing「 75 − 245 (based on level) (+ 200% bonus AD) total physical damage over 2 seconds, 」「 4.6875 − 15.3125 (based on level) (+ 12.5% bonus AD) physical damage every 0.125 seconds over 2 seconds, 」increased to 120% damage against  monsters. The target cannot gain stacks during this time.

0.text: Active: Talon  dashes towards the target enemy, dealing physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target to  critically strike for (50% +  35%) bonus physical damage, as well as gain  75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.

1.text: If Noxian Diplomacy kills the target, Talon  heals for 9 − 55 (based on level) and its cooldown is  reduced by 50%.

2.text: Noxian Diplomacy's stab  resets Talon's basic attack timer.  Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Talon throws a fan of daggers in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit.

1.text: At maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before homing back to Talon, dealing physical damage and  slowing enemies hit for 1 second. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: Active: Talon  dashes up to 800 units over the target area of terrain, during which he gains  unobstructed vision.

1.text: Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same area of terrain for a set duration.

2.text: Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him that deals physical damage to nearby enemies, and gains  invisibility and  bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.

1.text: Shadow Assault can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if Talon emerges from invisibility.

2.text: Recast: Talon ends Shadow Assault, breaking invisibility and converging the blades to him, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or  Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to the target instead.
